title: "AI Identifies Key Predictors of Depression in Older Adults"
excerpt: "Depression is a leading cause of disability globally. An estimated 300 million people worldwide—roughly 4.4 percent of the global population—are suffering from this common mental health disorder, according to a World Health Organization report."
